name: Inin
description:
Roll d100.
|Roll       |Result             |
|1-2        |Ecthvasin          |
|3-4        |Georothin          |
|5-6        |Kaindorin          |
|7-9        |Jiinin             |
|10-12      |Thairin            |
|13-17      |Grazin             |
|18-22      |Rodonin            |
|23-29      |Bryonin            |
|30-36      |Ganzenonin         |
|37-43      |Rivanonin          |
|44-60      |Melfarionin        |
|61-80      |Letelin            |
|81-100     |Thuilin            |
Inin Features:
Inin stand at about 5-6 ft tall, weighing approximately 120-200 lbs on average.
Inin have standard length pointed ears.
Inin are the most numerous species by far on Adûrun, and thus the most varied in their appearances, cultures, and
demeanors.
Inin typically live 80-120 years.
Inin seemingly have less survival instincts than average, and are oftentimes more warlike, but on the other side of that
coin, are far more spirited and willing to endure hardship.

name: Anz
description:
Roll d100.
|Roll      |Result            |
|1-70      |West Anzar        |
|71-100    |East Anzar        |
Anz Features:
Anz stand at about 12-15 ft tall, and weigh approximately 600-700 lbs on average.
Anz have long saber-like ears about the length of one’s forearm and white eyes with no irises or pupils
Anz have a naturally low fat content, broad features, coarse woolly black hair, caramel, coffee, or umber brown skin, and
put on muscle faster than the other species.
Anz value tranquility and are stoic in demeanor due to a quickness to anger that plagues them.
Anz live about 60-100 years on average.
Anz are a large creature.

name: Cerevu
description:
Roll d100.
|Roll      |Result     |
|1-55      |Darii      |
|56-100    |Cerii      |
Cerevu Features:
Cerevu typically stand at about 4-5 ft tall, weighing about 200-300 lbs on average.
Cerevu have rounded ears and are hairier than the other species, but are otherwise androgynous, as the other species are
unsure of how Cerevu reproduce.
Cerevu tend to be rounder and squatter in shape.
Cerevu live around 150-200 years on average.
Cerevu tend to have a very calm and tranquil disposition, and value quiet and industriousness above all else.

name: Venii
description:
Roll d100.
|Roll      |Result     |
|1-40      |Agunic     |
|41-100    |Unfaic     |
Venii Features:
Venii usually stand at 6-8 ft tall, weighing approximately 120-200 lbs on average.
Venii have jet black smooth chitinous skin, fine stark white hair, and glossy reflective eyes with arachnoid faces and
pedipalps, which they almost always keep veiled or hidden from non-Venii.
Venii have stringy, scrawny, tall, and slender builds, who otherwise seem like Phi’ilin.
Venii typically live 150-200 years on average.
Venii maintains an attempted pleasant attitude but suffers from a terribly awkward disposition.
